votebox.middle.view.widget

Class RadioButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.view.widget.AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
      • votebox.middle.view.widget.RadioButton

  • public class RadioButton
extends AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
    This strategy encapsulates the behavior expected with radio buttons. When any button wants to be selected, it is allowed, but all other buttons in its group are deselected first.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public void select(ToggleButton element)
        Description copied from class: AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
        A toggle button calls this method to ask to be selected. If an implementing strategy allows the selection to be made, it should call the button's makeSelected(...) method.
        Specified by:
        select in class AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
        Parameters:
        element - This is the button that wishes to be selected.
        See Also:
        AToggleButtonGroupStrategy.select(votebox.middle.view.widget.ToggleButton)

      • deselect

        public void deselect(ToggleButton element,
            boolean playSound)
        Description copied from class: AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
        A toggle button calls this method to ask to be deselected. If an implementing strategy allows this deselection to be made, it should call the button's makeDeselected(...) method.
        Specified by:
        deselect in class AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
        Parameters:
        element - This is the button that wishes to be deselected.
        See Also:
        AToggleButtonGroupStrategy.deselect(ToggleButton, boolean)
